if ($data['variables']) {

    $result = Yii::$app->db->transaction(function ($e) use ($id, $updateData, $insertData) {

        if ($updateData) {

            foreach ($updateData as $v) {

                return [
                    'env_id' => $id,
                    'name'   => $v['name'],
                    'value'  => $v['value'],
                ];
            }, $insertData);

            return Yii::$app->db->createCommand()
                ->batchInsert($table, ['env_id', 'name', 'value'], $insertData)
                ->execute();

        return true;
